short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alows to comment web links and post them at the latis.cc website for community attention and populating the themed news feeds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension helps with posting of web links on the latis.cc website to garner community attention, facilitate discussions, and populate themed news feeds.
